name: Synaptic Field
author: Sacred Shifter Collective
description: Intelligence forming. Nodes light up. Connections pulse with electrical fire. You witness synaptic activity across a cosmic brain. Coherence reveals symmetry. Gain reveals faster pulses. This is consciousness recognizing itself.
metaphysicalNotes: Synaptic Field mirrors the structure of consciousness itself. Group coherence reveals symmetrical patterns. Individual gain increases pulse speed. Intelligence is not separate from awarenessâ€”it IS awareness organizing itself.
